title: Disturbing Behavior Extended Director's Cut DVDrip Katie Holmes
description:
"It doesn't matter if you're not perfect. You will be." 
"Disturbing Behavior" was originally released in 1998 as a confusing 83-minute cut. The movie's director, David Nutter, had intended to release the film as a 115-minute feature but studio interference forced him to cut out many important scenes that made the film a hundred times better than what was ultimately released. The DVD release included 10 of these deleted scenes and the original ending, which I have carefully edited back into the movie. This new extended cut now runs at 103 minutes and is much better than the truncated theatrical cut. The quality of the added scenes is noticeably different than the theatrical version scenes but not by much. The film is presented in non-anamorphic 1.85:1 widescreen format (the deleted scenes were released non-anamorphic on the DVD). If you are a fan of this film you will be satisfied with the extended version. I will seed the film for as long as other people continue seeding. Enjoy!
